original_text:
Your iniquities have turned these away,
    and your sins have kept good from you.
korean_text: 너희 허물이 이러한 일들을 물리쳤고 너희 죄가 너희로부터 좋은 것을 막았느니라

sentences.original_text: Your iniquities have turned these away,
and your sins have kept good from you.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 죄가 너희에게 좋은 것을 막았느니라.
